ai-tha-ap215:1.2_0: at the fore of the mendicant Saṅgha,
ai-tha-ap215:1.4_0: and making no desire for the great crowd,
ai-tha-ap215:2.2_0: in meeting with the rainy season.
ai-tha-ap215:2.3_0: While I was sitting in that peaceful,
ai-tha-ap215:3.2_0: I went to the realm of the gods,
ai-tha-ap215:3.4_0: I used to be in the past.
ai-tha-ap215:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap215:5.1_0: with six factors abodes in this place.
ai-tha-ap215:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Saccaka.
ai-tha-ap215:8.1_0: Truth, for the third time I worship (them).
